name: Stardust
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create a portal at target point within range, which in turn spews out a stream of superheated stardust in a 30 foot long, 5 foot wide line in a direction you choose. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 fire and 1d8 radiant damage. Creatures that succeed take half damage. Creatures damaged by this spell have stardust cling to them, causing them to take additional fire and radiant damage from all sources equal to your proficiency modifier until the end of your next turn.

The portal remains until the end of your next turn. You can spend 1 AP during your next turn to open the portal wider and unleash another stream of stardust in the same area.
empower: Choose one - length increased to 60 feet, or width increased to 10 feet, or fire and radiant damage on the second stream of stardust becomes 2d6 each.
